page.title: 05"EXCELSIOR" CHEF
page.content: Chefs in the hotel are allocated certain responibilties in the preparation of a meal such as the vegetables or the sauces.When it is busy or when there are functions on, it is hectic for the chefs.Most of the functions are weddings.Most chefs enjoy getting moved around so that they can get a variety of work. This job involves shift-work-from 10am till 2.30pm and then from 6pm till 10.30pm.A chef needs to be willing to work unsocial hours,but a number of chefs do not like the split shifts. "Most of us don't enjoy cleaning up after the cooking,"said one young chef."If you like your job you'll soon get on."
